description: This code: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/api/ec2/__init__.py#L270-L288 uses requests directly to talk to keystone, which means that the ssl option configuration is nonstandard. We should use the keystoneclient directly for consistency.
title: ec2 code uses requests to talk to keystone (not keystoneclient)
